description:
www.angular-up.com
Brought to you by 500Tech and the community
@AngularUP

Uri Shaked - AoT and the New Angular Compile 

One of the amazing features offered by Angular 2 is Ahead of Time template compilation. It comes with a lot of benefits, such as static analysis of your application templates, runtime performance benefits, and reduced production payload size.

In this talk, we are going to learn about ngc - the new Angular Compiler, discuss the internal mechanisms that make it tick, and discover how our apps can benefit from it.
title: Uri Shaked - AoT and the New Angular Compiler | AngularUP 2016
